name: LBRY Credits
description:
LBRY is a blockchain-based digital content protocol containing a digital library of content such as videos, music, games. LBRY reportedly has millions of pieces of content, ranging from Hollywood films to user-generated originals. 

LBRY can be used on a desktop computer or mobile phone via an [app](https://lbry.com/get) as well as on the [web](https://lbry.tv).

LBRY Credits (LBC) are used to publish, purchase, and support content on the LBRY network. LBC are also used to aid the discovery of content through open-source top/trending algorithms and help increase the relevancy of search results.

- Try LBRY on the web: (https://lbry.tv)
- Use LBRY on desktop or Android: (https://lbry.com/get)
- Beginner introduction to LBRY: (https://lbry.com/faq/what-is-lbry)
- Block Rewards and Mining: (https://lbry.com/faq/block-rewards) 
- Credits Policy: (https://lbry.com/faq/credit-policy) 
- YouTube Partner Program: (https://lbry.com/youtube)
- News: (https://lbry.com/news)
- Full technical spec: (https://lbry.tech/spec)
- Other technical resources: (https://lbry.tech)
